A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Don't get me wrong\, the movie was full of amazing scenes\, fulfilling moments\, and was very enjoyable. But fans of TFA have been waiting for certain characters to shine\, and questions to be answered. This movie did not please them. In fact it said to them\, \"we don't care about any of that\".\n\nHonestly\, I don't know what to look forward to in a 9th movie.
